statements: UPDATE vehicle_maintenance_records SET vehicle_name = 'Car A', maintenance_type = 'Oil Change' WHERE vehicle_id = 1;
UPDATE vehicle_maintenance_records SET maintenance_description = 'Replaced brake pads', maintenance_date = '2022-10-15' WHERE vehicle_id = 2;
UPDATE vehicle_maintenance_records SET maintenance_type = 'Oil Change', maintenance_date = '2022-05-15', maintenance_description = 'Performed regular oil change' WHERE vehicle_id = 1;

UPDATE vehicle_maintenance_records SET vehicle_name = 'Toyota Camry', maintenance_type = 'Tire Rotation', maintenance_description = 'Rotated tires to ensure even wear', maintenance_date = '2022-06-20' WHERE vehicle_id = 2;
UPDATE vehicle_maintenance_records SET cost = 1500.00, maintenance_date = '2023-05-15' WHERE record_id = 101
UPDATE maintenance_schedules SET frequency = 'Annual', schedule_date = '2023-06-10' WHERE schedule_id = 201
UPDATE vehicle_maintenance_records SET cost = 1500.50, mechanic_name = 'John Doe' WHERE record_id = 1;
UPDATE maintenance_schedules SET frequency = 'Biweekly', schedule_date = '2023-05-15' WHERE vehicle_id = 5;
UPDATE vehicle SET year = 2020, make = 'Toyota' WHERE vehicle_id = 1;
UPDATE maintenance SET mechanic = 'John Doe', cost = 125.50 WHERE maintenance_id = 2;
UPDATE vehicle SET make='Ford', model='Mustang', year=2020, mileage=15000 WHERE vehicle_id=1;
UPDATE maintenance SET maintenance_type='Oil Change', mechanic='John Doe', cost=50.00 WHERE maintenance_id=1;
UPDATE vehicle SET mileage=50000 WHERE vehicle_id=1;
UPDATE maintenance_records SET cost=500.00, service_description='Oil Change' WHERE record_id=1;
UPDATE vehicle SET model = 'SUV', year = 2021 WHERE vehicle_id = 1;
UPDATE maintenance_schedule SET next_service_date = '2022-01-15', service_type = 'Oil Change' WHERE vehicle_id = 2;
UPDATE vehicle SET year = 2022 WHERE make = 'Toyota' AND model = 'Camry';
UPDATE mechanic SET phone = '555-5555' WHERE name = 'John Doe';
UPDATE vehicle SET make='Ford', model='F-150', year=2020 WHERE id=1;
UPDATE maintenance_record SET cost=500.25, date='2022-06-15' WHERE id=3;
